items.sentence: Can you guess how much this diamond is worth?

Discussing the matter won\'t get us anywhere.
Why do you think Tom wanted to do that today?
I fell in love with you the moment I saw you.
I\'ll try to remember to remind you tomorrow.
I\'m about three centimeters taller than Tom.
I\'m certain Tom will want to speak with you.
Tom was handsome when he was in his twenties.
Tom was in the right place at the right time.
Tom was in the wrong place at the wrong time.
You\'re not actually threatening me, are you?
You\'re not going there by yourself, are you?
Are you sure you want to throw that one away?
Are you working on any exciting new projects?
There are way too many people on this island.
I won\'t be able to talk Tom into doing that.
Tom wouldn\'t tell us where he hid the money.
They should\'ve known that this would happen.
Tom says he wants to get a driver\'s license.
